para: If read-at-once >= 1, batch mode is enabled with that many sectors being read at a time. A value of zero disables batch mode and switches to single read mode. Not all devices support batch mode; in that case gpsbabel automatically switches to single read mode.
Under normal circumstances, the larger this number the faster the transfer. Reducing read-at-once or even switching to single sector mode might help when you get transmission errors/aborts.
